item.description:
I figure we could meet at this event to talk some about Valley 9/11 Truth during the pot luck. We will know by then about reserving the Frances Crowe community room for September for meetings and film events. Following a pot luck in Lyman Hall is an important talk on what is happening regarding the Fukushima reactors.

 

Hiroshima & Fukushima When: August 5, 2012 @ 7:00 pm – 8:30 pm Where: Lyman Hall, First Churches, Northampton, MA, USA

NORTHAMPTON talk and book signing with Cecile Pineda, author of “The Devil’s Tango.”  Lyman Hall, First Churches 5:30 PM Potluck dinner at 6:15 PM. Cecile’s talk at 7 PM. At 7:45 proceed to Smith’s Paradise Pond. At 8 PM for Hiroshima Day commemoration and floating candle ceremony.
item.how_to_find_us: Come there by 5:30.. I will place some information on a table, including new film, Dark Legacy - JFK & 9-11. Let's meet around there..
item.name: 9-11 - Fukushima - Hiroshima - Where next?
